params.880:
- All non-combat skills are permanently boosted by +12.

- The boost from this Relic does not stack with any other weaker boosts but can be over-written by a stronger one.

- When using this Relic, skills that are boosted above +12 will over time drain back to the original +12 boost.

- When using this Relic, skills that are drained below +12 will over time restore back to the original +12 boost.
